mapper.select: select t.dwmc,t.dwdm,t.lxr,t.lxr_dh,t.bz,(select id from sys_office where code=t.dwdm||'00') id, sfqy,decode(sfqy,'1','启用','未启用') sfqymc, to_char(createtime,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') createtime from app_dept t where isdel='0' order by createtime desc

select r.userid, r.username, r.loginname, r.pwd, r.upwd, r.gddh, r.yddh, r.dw, r.sfqy, decode(sfqy, '1', '启用', '未启用') sfqymc, r.fpz, r.email, r.bzxx, (select b.id from SYS_USERROLE a, V_OFFICE b where b.code like '%00' and length(b.code)=6 and a.userid = r.userid and a.roleid = b.id ) admin, (select o.rtname from v_office o,sys_userrole u where o.id= u.ROLEID and type = '2' and u.USERID = r.USERID) pzdw, (select b.parent_name from SYS_USERROLE a, V_OFFICE b where b.code like '%00' and length(b.code)=6 and a.userid = r.userid and a.roleid = b.id ) adminmc, to_char(createtime, 'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') createtime from app_user r where isdel = '0' and r.userid!='1'
and (r.username like '%'||#{c1}||'%' or r.loginname like '%'||#{c1}||'%')
order by createtime desc

select r.userid,r.username,r.loginname,r.pwd,r.upwd,r.gddh,r.yddh,r.dw,r.sfqy, decode(sfqy,'1','启用','未启用') sfqymc, (select b.id from SYS_USERROLE a, V_OFFICE b where b.code like '%00' and length(b.code)=6 and a.userid = r.userid and a.roleid = b.id ) admin, (select o.rtname from v_office o,sys_userrole u where o.id= u.ROLEID and type = '2' and u.USERID = r.USERID) fpz
,r.email,r.bzxx, to_char(createtime,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') createtime, nvl((select 1 from sys_userrole where userid=r.userid and roleid=#{id}),2) status from app_user r where isdel='0'
and r.username like '%'||#{c1}||'%'
order by createtime desc

select r.userid, r.username, r.loginname, r.pwd, r.upwd, r.gddh, r.yddh, r.dw, r.sfqy, decode(sfqy, '1', '启用', '未启用') sfqymc, r.fpz, r.email, r.bzxx, (select b.id from SYS_USERROLE a, V_OFFICE b where b.type in ('1','2','3') and a.userid = r.userid and a.roleid = b.id) admin, (select b.name from SYS_USERROLE a, V_OFFICE b where b.type in ('1','2','3') and a.userid = r.userid and a.roleid = b.id) adminmc, to_char(createtime, 'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') createtime from app_user r where isdel = '0' and r.userid != '1' and r.userid != '2' and r.userid !=#{userid} and (exists (select 1 from SYS_USERROLE s, v_office t where r.userid = s.userid and s.roleid = t.id and t.rt = #{dwdm}) or not exists (select 1 from SYS_USERROLE s, v_office t where r.userid = s.userid and s.roleid = t.id and t.rt != #{dwdm} and t.type in ('1', '2', '3')))
and r.username like '%'||#{c1}||'%'
order by createtime desc

select r.userid, r.username, r.loginname, r.pwd, r.upwd, r.gddh, r.yddh, r.dw, r.sfqy, decode(sfqy, '1', '启用', '未启用') sfqymc, r.fpz, r.email, r.bzxx, (select b.id from SYS_USERROLE a, V_OFFICE b where b.type in ('1','2','3') and a.userid = r.userid and a.roleid = b.id) admin, (select b.name from SYS_USERROLE a, V_OFFICE b where b.type in ('1','2','3') and a.userid = r.userid and a.roleid = b.id) adminmc, to_char(createtime, 'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') createtime from app_user r where isdel = '0' and r.userid != '1' and r.userid != '2' and r.userid !=#{userid} and exists (select 1 from SYS_USERROLE s, v_office t where r.userid = s.userid and s.roleid = t.id and t.rt = #{dwdm})
and r.username like '%'||#{c1}||'%'
order by createtime desc
